element.definition: No description

element.label: NHI
element.definition: National health identifier use = official
element.comment: Is a pre-defined slice on Patient.identifier

element.label: dormantNHI
element.definition: Old NHI's that have been merged with the current one
element.comment: A pre-defined slice on Patient.identifier (use = old)

element.label: otherIdentifier
element.definition: Other identifiers for the patient (apart from the NHI)

element.label: name
element.short: A name associated with the patient
element.definition: A name associated with the individual.

element.label: isPreferred
element.short: Indicates the name the patient prefers
element.definition: When there is more than one name, this element indicates the preferred one. There should only be a single name with isPreferrred

element.label: telecom
element.short: A contact detail for the individual
element.definition: A contact detail (e.g. a telephone number or an email address) by which the individual may be contacted.

element.label: authorizedForUse
element.short: True if this telecom has been allowed by the patient
element.definition: Indicates that the patient has authorized use of thes

element.label: validatedByPatient
element.short: True if the patient has confirmed the name is correct
element.definition: No description

element.label: gender
element.definition: Administrative Gender - the gender that the patient is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

binding.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

element.label: birthDate
element.short: The date of birth for the individual
element.definition: The date of birth for the individual.

element.label: deceased[x]
element.short: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not and possibly the date of death
element.definition: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not.

element.label: address
element.definition: An address for the individual.

element.label: addressLine
element.definition: The lines that make up the address

element.label: suburb
element.definition: Uses the same extension as NHI

element.label: authorizedForUse
element.definition: Indicates that the patient has authorized that this address can be used to contact them.
element.comment: Not the same as 'isPreferred' as multiple addresses could be authorized

element.label: validatedByPatient
element.definition: Indicates that the address has been confirmed as correct by the patient.
element.comment: This is a 'provenance' type of element, but the full Provenance resource seems a bit overkill for this.

element.label: domicilecode
element.definition: No description

element.label: generalPractitioner
element.definition: Patient's nominated care provider.

element.label: healthlinkEDI
element.definition: The healthlink EDI value
element.comment: NOTE: this is an extension on the Organization resource - it is NOT a property of the Patient. Properly, it should be attached to the Location resource - but this would require an intermediate PractitionerRole resource, that seems overly complex for the requirements. But - if we needed to support multiple EDI accounts for one patient to go to specific GP surgeries, then the PR resource would be required.

element.label: citizenship
element.definition: The citizenship status.

element.label: sourceDHB
element.short: The DHB that sourced the record
element.definition: The DHB where this record came from (Multiple DHB systems will have copies of the same patient.

element.label: ethnicity
element.definition: The patients ethnicity - up to 6 items

element.label: placeOfBirth
element.definition: Where the patient was born

element.label: contact
element.definition: No description
element.comment: Specifically for emergency contact, NOK etc.

element.label: name
element.definition: No description

element.label: relationship
element.definition: No description

element.label: telecom
element.definition: No description

element.label: language
element.definition: Language spokes

element.label: language
element.definition: The actual language spoken

element.label: preferred
element.definition: True if this is the preferred language

element.label: interpreterNeeded
element.definition: true if an interpreter is needed
